001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.OutputStream;
006import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
007import java.net.URL;
008import java.net.URLDecoder;
009import java.net.URLEncoder;
010import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Collection;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Map;
015
016import org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64;
017import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
018import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
019import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceImpl;
020import org.json.JSONObject;
021import org.json.JSONTokener;
022import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
023import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
024import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
025import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
026import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
027import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.FlowStyle;
029import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
030import org.yaml.snakeyaml.error.MarkedYAMLException;
031
032/**
033 * Resource loaded from data:application/json-eobject-spec... URI. Supports json and yaml formats. Defaults to YAML if format is not specified.
034 * @author Pavel
035 *
036 */
037public abstract class ObjectLoaderResource extends ResourceImpl {
038        
039        private static final String BASE_KEY = "base";
040        private static final String QUALIFIER_KEY = "qualifier";
041        private static final String FORMAT_KEY = "format";
042        private static final String SPEC_KEY = "spec";
043        private static final String BASE64 = ";base64,";
044        private static final String OBJECT_SPEC_URI_PREFIX = "data:application/json-eobject-spec";
045        
046        /**
047         * 
048         * @param spec
049         * @param format
050         * @param base
051         * @param qualifier Used to differentiate two identical specs so they yield different URI's and are considered to be different resources. 
052         * Can be null. If null, the URI is a "value object" URI, and otherwise it is an "entity URI".
053         * @return
054         */
055        public static URI encode(String spec, String format, URI base, Object qualifier) {
056                JSONObject specObj = new JSONObject();
057                specObj.put(SPEC_KEY, spec);
058                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(format)) {
059                        specObj.put(FORMAT_KEY, format);
060                }
061                if (base != null) {
062                        specObj.put(BASE_KEY, base.toString());
063                }
064                if (qualifier != null) {
065                        specObj.put(QUALIFIER_KEY, qualifier);                  
066                }
067                String specStr = specObj.toString();
068                return URI.createURI(OBJECT_SPEC_URI_PREFIX + BASE64 + URLEncoder.encode(Base64.encodeBase64String(specStr.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)), StandardCharsets.UTF_8));         
069        }
070        
071        public ObjectLoaderResource(URI uri) {
072                super(uri);
073        }
074        
075        protected abstract ObjectLoader getObjectLoader();
076        
077        protected abstract ProgressMonitor getProgressMonitor();
078        
079        protected abstract Context getContext();
080        
081        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
082        @Override
083        public void load(Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
084                String uriStr = getURI().toString();
085                
086                // Loading from data:... URI
087                if (uriStr.startsWith(OBJECT_SPEC_URI_PREFIX +";") || uriStr.startsWith(OBJECT_SPEC_URI_PREFIX +",")) {
088                        uriStr = uriStr.substring(OBJECT_SPEC_URI_PREFIX.length());
089                        if (uriStr.startsWith(BASE64)) {
090                                uriStr = new String(Base64.decodeBase64(URLDecoder.decode(uriStr.substring(BASE64.length()), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
091                        } else {
092                                uriStr = URLDecoder.decode(uriStr.substring(1), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
093                        }
094                        JSONObject specObj = new JSONObject(new JSONTokener(uriStr));
095                        boolean isYaml;
096                        String spec = specObj.getString(SPEC_KEY);
097                        if (specObj.has(FORMAT_KEY)) {
098                                isYaml = "yaml".equalsIgnoreCase(specObj.getString(FORMAT_KEY));
099                        } else {
100                                isYaml = spec == null || !(spec.trim().startsWith("{") && spec.trim().endsWith("}")); // If starts with { and ends with } assuming a Json object definition.
101                        }
102                        URI base = specObj.has(BASE_KEY) ? URI.createURI(specObj.getString(BASE_KEY)) : null;
103                        ObjectLoader objectLoader = getObjectLoader();
104                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor = getProgressMonitor();
105                        Object obj = isYaml ? objectLoader.loadYaml(spec, base, progressMonitor) : objectLoader.loadJsonObject(spec, base, progressMonitor);
106                        
107                        if (obj instanceof SupplierFactory) {
108                                obj = Util.call(((SupplierFactory<Object>) obj).create(getContext()), progressMonitor, this::onDiagnostic);
109                        } 
110                        
111                        if (obj instanceof EObject) {
112                                getContents().add((EObject) obj);
113                        } else {        
114                                throw new NasdanikaException("Not an instance of EObject or SupplierFactory: " + obj);
115                        }
116                } else {
117                        super.load(options);
118                }
119        }
120        
121        /**
122         * Called by the supplier factory.
123         * @param diagnostic
124         */
125        protected abstract void onDiagnostic(org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic diagnostic);       
126        
127        @Override
128        public EObject getEObject(String uriFragment) {
129                return super.getEObject(uriFragment == null ? "/" : uriFragment);
130        }
131        
132        protected abstract boolean isJsonObject();
133        
134        protected abstract boolean isJsonArray();
135        
136        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
137        @Override
138        protected void doLoad(InputStream inputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
139                ProgressMonitor progressMonitor = getProgressMonitor();
140                try {
141                        Object data;
142                        if (isJsonArray()) {
143                                 data = getObjectLoader().loadJsonArray(inputStream, getURI(), progressMonitor);                                
144                        } else if (isJsonObject()) {
145                                data = getObjectLoader().loadJsonObject(inputStream, getURI(), progressMonitor);                                
146                        } else {
147                                data = getObjectLoader().loadYaml(inputStream, getURI(), progressMonitor);                              
148                        }
149                        
150                        if (data instanceof Collection) {
151                                getContents().addAll((Collection<EObject>) data);
152                        } else {
153                                if (data instanceof SupplierFactory) {
154                                        EObject eObject = Util.call(((SupplierFactory<EObject>) data).create(getContext()), progressMonitor, this::onDiagnostic);
155                                        getContents().add(eObject);
156                                } else if (data instanceof EObject) {
157                                        getContents().add((EObject) data);
158                                } else {
159                                        throw new IOException("Not an instance of EObject: " + data);
160                                }
161                        }
162                } catch (MarkedYAMLException e) {
163                        throw new ConfigurationException(e.getMessage(), e, new MarkerImpl(getURI().toString(), e.getProblemMark()));
164                } catch (RuntimeException | IOException e) {
165                        throw e;
166                } catch (Exception e) {
167                        throw new NasdanikaException(e);
168                }
169        }
170        
171        protected abstract Storable toStorable(EObject eObj);
172                
173        @Override
174        protected void doSave(OutputStream outputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
175                List<Object> data = new ArrayList<>();
176                for (EObject e: getContents()) {
177                        Storable storable = toStorable(e);
178                        if (storable == null) {
179                                throw new IOException("Cannot adapt " + e + " to " + Storable.class.getName());
180                        }
181                        data.add(storable.store(new URL(getURI().toString()), getProgressMonitor()));
182                }
183                
184                DumperOptions dumperOptions = new DumperOptions();
185                dumperOptions.setDefaultFlowStyle(FlowStyle.BLOCK);
186                dumperOptions.setIndent(4);
187                Yaml yaml = new Yaml(dumperOptions);
188                yaml.dump(data.size() == 1 ? data.get(0) : data, new OutputStreamWriter(outputStream));         
189        }
190        
191}
